title: Has my game crashed, or is it loading reeeeeally slowly?
body:
I had a game just before where we were at the loading screen for a good five minutes, everyone at 100%, but when the game finally started 2 people on my team had disconnected. On the other hand, I've had games where I've been sitting at the loading screen for a very long time, but when it finally goes into the game, people are screaming at me for leaving!

Is there a sure way to know who's fault it is - or at least that it isn't yours?
